title: Strawberry gateau
description: This easy gateau recipe piles sumptuous summer fruits onto Drambuie cream and sponge. Takes minutes but looks stunning.
ingredients: 5 tbsp Drambuie (or liqueur of your choice)
2 punnets large strawberries, trimmed and cut in half lengthways
½ punnet each mixed berries - raspberries, blueberries and blackberries
